tool.name: SAGA.grid_tools.8
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayFEATURES False output_data_BUFFER $output_data_BUFFER name SAGA.grid_tools.8 FEATURES $FEATURES TYPE $TYPE DISTANCE $DISTANCE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_BUFFER $OutputSection_BUFFER.outputType_BUFFER transmissionMode_BUFFER $OutputSection_BUFFER.transmissionMode_BUFFER

param.name: FEATURES
param.label: Features
param.help: Features The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: DISTANCE
param.label: Distance
param.help: Fixed buffer distance given in map units.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_BUFFER
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: This tool creates buffers around features in a grid. Features are defined by any value greater than zero. With the buffer distance method 'cell's value', the feature grid's cell values are used as buffer distance. In any case the buffer distance has to be specified using map units. The output buffer grid cell values refer to 1 := inside the buffer, 2 := feature location.
